programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: "Miss USA Show" - Over the course of three days, six contestants compete against each other in three stunts designed to test them both physically and mentally.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: "Best Friends Show" - Over the course of three days, six contestants compete against each other in three stunts designed to test them both physically and mentally.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: "NY vs LA Show" - Over the course of three days, six contestants compete against each other in three stunts designed to test them both physically and mentally.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: "Fire Fear Factor" - Teams hang from a cargo net dangling from a helicopter, while their opponents fire water cannons at them eating the hottest peppers on the planet.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: "Heli Platform to Platform Jump, Barber Shop, Container Launch" - This episode features four co-ed pairs competing as teams. In the first stunt, both team members leap back and forth between two platforms hanging from helicopters with each person transferring up to 10 flags from one platform to the other and then jumping in the water. The three teams to get highest flag total will advance to the next round. In the second stunt one team member is seated in a barber chair and their partner spins them. When the chair stops, they have to get whichever haircut their head was pointing to. There are six haircuts they can get. Teams would advance to the finals if both members got their designated haircuts. In the finale a crane lifts a large container to 200 feet in the air, both team members have to climb rope ladders hanging from the container. Once they reach the container, they both have to scale a narrow ledge on the side, collect two Allen wrenches, and climb another ladder to the top. Once on top, they have to use the wrenches to unscrew hatches and climb down into the container. When they were both inside, they have to touch two pieces of a live wire together in order to blow themselves out of the container and into the water below. The team to complete this stunt the fastest would be the Fear Factor Champions at winning $50,000. This week competing in the Home Invasion is the Frederickson family of Hagerstown, Maryland.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: "Farm Fear Factor" - Contestants crawl through a pigsty and find themselves being dragged behind a tractor. Host Joe Rogan.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: "Heist Fear Factor" - Contestants are challenged to an extremely fast helicopter stunt, to crawl through a vent system filled with rats, spiders and fire, and to retrieve a prize from a sunken armoured car.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: "Psycho Fear Factor Episode 1" - Six couples compete in a variety of stunts while living together in the Bates Motel.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: "Psycho Fear Factor Episode 2" - Contestants must live together and compete in and around the "Psycho" house and the Bates Motel.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: "Psycho Fear Factor Episode 3" - Couples in straitjackets must eat live camel-spiders, and a home invasion in Dallas.

programme.title: This Land Is Your Land
programme.desc: With the Ranchers trapped and without hope, Alicia is thrust into a position of leadership where she's forced to make life-changing decisions.

programme.title: El Matadero
programme.desc: Alicia encounters a potential ally. Ofelia fights for survival, while Nick uses his skillset for profit in the apocalypse.

programme.title: Things Bad Begun
programme.desc: Strand's motives are made clear when Nick discovers a new threat descending on the dam. Madison faces a horrifying revelation.

programme.title: The Diviner
programme.desc: With the Ranch dangerously low on resources, Madison and Walker leave in search of a solution. Nick and Alicia struggle to keep the peace.

programme.title: La Serpiente
programme.desc: Following the rekindling of an old friendship, a mission is launched to replenish the Ranch's water supply by seeking the help of another community.

programme.title: Brother's Keeper
programme.desc: As Nick and Jake set out to handle a delicate situation, the Ranch prepares for a threat greater than any they've faced before.

programme.title: This Land Is Your Land

programme.title: Hansel and Gretel
programme.desc: In this modern retelling of the classic horror tale, teen siblings are enslaved by a psychotic recluse within her gruesome house of horrors in the woods.

programme.title: Lord of the Elves
programme.desc: In an ancient age, the peace-loving Hobbits are enslaved by the Java Men, a race of flesh-eating dragon-riders. The young Hobbit Goben must join forces with their neighbor giants, the humans, to free his people and vanquish their enemies.

programme.title: Sinbad And The War Of The Furies
programme.desc: On a treasure hunt gone wrong, modern-day adventurer Sinbad accidentally releases the Furies, three beautiful but terrible ancient beings powerful enough to threaten life on Earth.

programme.title: Titanic II
programme.desc: On the 100th anniversary of the original voyage, a modern luxury liner christened "Titanic II," follows the path of its namesake. But when a tsunami hurls an ice berg into the new ship's path, the passengers and crew must fight to avoid a similar fate.

programme.title: Trolland
programme.desc: Fenn the Troll hates the Troll pastime of pranking, and is teased so much for it that he runs away. But when a long-suffering park ranger starts capturing the other Trolls, it's up to Fenn to rescue his family and friends - without pranking.

programme.title: War of the Worlds
programme.desc: Astronomer George Herbert (C. Thomas Howell) is assigned to investigate reports of strange meteors crashing into earth near New York, Los Angeles and Washington, D.C. As the meteors land, enormous multi-limbed metal creatures disembark and begin destroying everything and everyone in their path with heat-ray guns. Amidst the apocalyptic destruction, Herbert teams with a soldier (Andy Lauer) and a pastor (Rhett Giles) on his journey into Washington to reunite with his family.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A bomb, constructed to cause as much damage as possible, kills a victim with deadly force and flame. When a search yields some tiny clues, police are able to identify the killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A twelve-year-old girl claimed she had been abducted and sexually assaulted. She recounted what happened in such a flat, unemotional voice that police found it difficult to believe her.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When the number and volume of bloodstains at the scene was greater than usual, it was up to forensic scientists to find out why.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The victim had ingested a massive amount of cyanide. An unlikely clue - a flaw on a mailing envelope - exposed a murderer who was willing to kill innocent people.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: They thought the fire would cover their crime. But one tiny clue, no bigger than a thumbtack, remained. It held all the information investigators needed to put a trio of killers behind bars.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1994, Shannon Melendi disappeared while at Emory University. Her disappearance remained a mystery for ten years, until new scientific testing cast a different light on Colvin "Butch" Hinton.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1987, the death of Crystal Purcell was considered an accident. Then in 2001, Barbara Purcell called police to suggest that her estranged husband had killed Crystal.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The woman was dead. The man had been shot four times and survived. When the man's version of events contradicted physical evidence, investigators turned to forensic science.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: How did the stalker obtain the security system code for his victim's home? How did he steal her personal photographs? Police needed answers and they found them in the most unlikely of places.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: After inspecting storm damage to a home in Tampa, an insurance assessor simply disappeared. Thirty hours later, her body was found in a nearby river. But the killer had been careless.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A murder trail turned cold, until police got a call from a woman whose husband, Gerald Powers, had a criminal past and a fondness for Chevy Berettas.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1991, Grand Junction, Colorado is on edge after a series of deadly bombings kill two people and injure one more. Police race to find the culprit before he strikes again.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Lives changed in the 20 years following an unsolved murder, and so did forensic science. In time, a high-powered microscope and DNA profiling revealed a clue no one had seen before.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A lifelong resident of the tiny town of Lefroy, Tasmania was murdered outside his own home. Robbery appeared to be the motive, but with no suspects, the investigation came to a halt.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1997, Kelly Eckart's car was found, with her belongings still in it, after she worked a late shift in Franklin, Indiana. Days later, her body was found in an isolated ravine.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1996, Derrick Duehren returned to find his Oregon home burned to the ground. His wife's charred remains were later found in the rubble.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A millionaire and his family were executed in their own home. For three years, the murders went unsolved. Finally, a box of ammunition and some fluorescent fibers revealed the ultimate betrayal.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a young girl was found dead, police quickly arrested the most likely suspect. But cutting-edge technology from NASA enabled a forensic odontologist to prove the wrong man was behind bars.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Fix My Friend" - In a challenge for L'Oreal, the designers team up with clients whose friends or loved ones are in desperate need of a makeover. The designers must consult and work with their clients to give them a new and flattering look that is also conducive to their lifestyle.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Oh My Lord and Taylor" - For the Lord and Taylor Challenge, the designers receive the opportunity to design a look for a capsule collection that celebrates ten seasons of Project Runway. If chosen as the winner, their look would join the ranks of many former Project Runway designers and winners, and it would be manufactured and sold at Lord and Taylor.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Starving Artist" - For this challenge, the designers divided into teams of three, and they must raise their own shopping money by selling t-shirts and other designs on the streets of NYC. Once they have raised their money, they have to design a two-piece fall collection, and one look must include a piece of outerwear.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "It's All About Me" - For the HP Challenge, the designers must create their own textile and design a look that is representative of their heritage. They are surprised when a member of their family comes for a surprise visit and helps them with their inspiration.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "I Get a Kick Out of Fashion" - The designers are treated to a show at Radio City Music Hall, where they learn that they will be designing an outfit for the world-famous Rockettes to wear in an upcoming performance.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "It's Fashion Baby" - For Heidi's challenge, the designers arrive at Babies R Us where they learn that they will be designing an outfit for their youngest clients yet—babies! In a twist of fate, they are also made to take care of "real" babies: dolls that cry when they need to be changed, fed, or burped. And if that wasn't enough, Heidi throws another twist at the designers they also must create a complementary look for the baby's mom to wear.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "In a Place Far, Far Away" - As the designers face their final challenge before Mercedes Benz Fashion Week, they are tasked with their most difficult and creative challenge yet: making an avant-garde look inspired by L'Oreal's new line of makeup called "Electric Fantasie".

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Finale Part 1" - Weak and weary from their journey, the few designers left say goodbye to NYC and return to their respective hometowns to begin working on their final collections. Tim Gunn travels to visit the designers and assess their progress. In the end, all four remaining designers must present their three best pieces to the judging panel, as the judges are left to decide who will move on to show at Mercedes Benz Fashion Week.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Finale Part 2" - It's the moment of truth for the remaining designers as they each present their final collections to an eager audience at Mercedes Benz Fashion Week. One designer is named the winner of Project Runway Season 10, and the rest are unfortunately out.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: ''And Sew It Begins'' - Heidi and Tim greet 17 new designers—the most in series history—and break the news that the final audition is still to come. The designers are challenged to create a garment from clothes from another designer's luggage in only five hours. The pressure is on as the designers must work against the clock to wow Heidi, Michael, Nina, and guest judge Selma Blair.

programme.title: Replicant
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme squares off against his deadliest opponent yet -- himself -- when he stars as both a heinous serial killer and the replicated clone that scientists have constructed in order to kill him.

programme.title: Road House
programme.desc: Dalton (Patrick Swayze) drives a Mercedes Benz, holds a degree in philosophy from NYU and makes lots of money. He's been shot at, stabbed and has broken most of the bones in his body. He also has a flip side - he's the best bar bouncer in the business. When Dalton's brought in to clean up a popular establishment that has become particularly rowdy, his calm is put to the test by the nasty local kingpin (Ben Gazzara) in this throwback to the great westerns of the 40s and 50s.

programme.title: Spy Kids 4

programme.title: Ender's Game
programme.desc: In the wake of an alien invasion, an unlikely recruit— a young and brilliant boy—is chosen to command the forces of Earth and fight for the future of our species.

programme.title: The Adventures of Buckaroo Banzai
programme.desc: Neurosurgeon. Physicist. Rock Star. With the help of his unique team, Buckaroo Banzai (Peter Weller) is ready to save the world on a moment's notice. But after his successful test of the Oscillation Overthruster, the evil Red Lectroids are unleashed from the 8th dimension. Led by Lord John Whorfin (John Lithgow), the Lectroids steal the Overthruster. But no matter where you go, there Buckaroo Banzai is...ready to battle an interdimensional menace that could spell doom for the entire human race.

programme.title: Tank Girl
programme.desc: In 2022, Earth is struck by a comet, leading to a massive drought. 11 years later a majority of the water left is kept in a reserve. Tank Girl (Lori Petty) is a member of a resistance group who steals whatever they want, by any means necessary. Being the enemies of the water reserve, their hideout is attacked, Tank Girl's boyfriend is killed and her friend Sam (Stacy Linn Ramsower) is captured! Now Tank Girl and her cohorts must break mega-villain Kesslee's (Malcolm McDowell) grip on the world.

programme.desc: A cunning attack on the ships proves the men are not battling an ordinary bear and that the region's Inuit culture may hold a key to their survival.

programme.title: Baywatch

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation:Drive
programme.desc: Joey is going away for the weekend with his latest girlfriend, and Craig is surprised when Joey tells him he can stay on his own – and even have the guys over! When the guys get to Craig’s for the weekend, they can’t think of much to do – they’re bored. After a lame afternoon they’re raring to let loose - and what better way than by taking a drive?

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation:Shout, Pt. 1
programme.desc: The Degrassi Panthers have a new star soccer player, Spinner. His victory’s even sweeter when Paige agrees to a movie. When the losing team's defensive back, the gorgeous Dean, invites a smitten Paige to a house party, she cancels on Spinner.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation:Shout, Pt. 2
programme.desc: Haunted by memories of her recent sexual assault, Paige is desperately trying to appear normal. A girl band contest sounds like a great distraction. Terri wants to reunite PMS—including Ashley. Paige refuses, and recruits Hazel instead.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation:Mirror in the Bathroom
programme.desc: Toby is tired of being an invisible computer geek so he decides to join a sports team. Girls love wrestlers - that includes Toby’s crush Kendra. To Toby's dismay, the few extra pounds he carries put him in the same weight class as athletic Sean.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation:Take My Breath Away
programme.desc: Manny’s crush on Craig has reached huge proportions and everyone’s urging her to ask him out already! But Manny’s a romantic she thinks the guy ought to do the asking

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation:Don't Believe the Hype
programme.desc: Grade Nine International Day is coming up and Hazel isn’t thrilled. After all, Hazel’s Jamaican and everybody loves the islands - right? When the day arrives, Hazel’s display is a hit, but she isn’t acting like herself.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation:White Wedding, Pt. 1
programme.desc: Emma Nelson is reveling in her newest job as her mom's maid of honour and planner extraordinaire! Her mom, Spike, is marrying her high-school crush, Snake - who also just happens to be Emma's favourite teacher.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation:When Doves Cry, Pt. 1

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation:Karma Chameleon
programme.desc: Ashley feels like an outcast. Nobody's willing to forget how she treated them at her party last year. Ash decides to take action, swallows her pride and apologizes to everyone. And it works. She boasts to Terri about her success- it’s like last year never happened!

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Meaningful Matches'' - Brandon rescues five different shelter dogs and trains them for their new forever families. In the end, these people & pet pairings prove to be truly meaningful matches for everyone involved.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''A Family Affair!'' - Brandon doesn't just consider the dog when creating a training plan, he also factors in the dynamic and needs of the forever family. In this episode Brandon revisits some of his most important and heart-warming "family inspired" training moments.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Best of: Ultimate Tests'' - From climbing a mountain to resisting temptation to swimming for safety,every dog that Brandon rescues has a unique set of challenges. And success will mean that they are ready for their new families.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''For Every Problem, There's a Solution'' - Every dog has a unique personality made up of wonderful traits and not so great habits. Today, Lucky Dog takes a look at Brandon's biggest training challenges to teach you that no matter what the issue, there's always a solution.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Out of the Box'' - Every dog presents its own unique set of challenges, and what works in one situation may require a bit more ingenuity in another. Today, Lucky Dog features some of Brandon's most creative training moments- including some "never before seen footage".

programme.title: Lucky Dog

programme.title: Unnatural Selection
programme.desc: Life emerged three and a half billion years ago, and since then has evolved into a dazzling variety of shapes and forms. Species that are best adapted to their environment survive. Humans are playing a huge part in this development, turning grasslands and forests into fields and cities, and polluting the air and water. What is happening to evolution? The answer is very simple: us.

programme.title: In the Land of Gorillas

programme.title: Plastic: The Real Sea Monster
programme.desc: Millions of tons of plastic enter the ocean every year, from rivers and shores, ships and platforms. The world’s scientists have studied the phenomenon and have come to alarming conclusions. Unlike other refuse, plastic stays in the water without breaking down. It becomes trapped in vast whirlpools of garbage called gyres. How is this deadly killer affecting the world’s oceans, and humanity?

programme.title: Danny Brown Explains Why He Got Kicked Off Nike HQ

programme.title: Laura Stylez vs Anna Bediones in a Sneaker Battle From Home | #LIFEATCOMPLEX
programme.desc: On this episode of Sneaker Battle From Home, we invite the ladies to throw down on the battle stage! Radio host, Laura Stylez, says her sneaker game can hang with the best of them, meanwhile we also invited our first ever international battler, Anna Bediones, to come showcase some of her exquisite footwear. These ladies definitely held their own, showcasing a variety of stylish and exclusive sneakers!

programme.title: Tyron Woodley Crowns the West Coast's Best Rapper | Complex Brackets
programme.desc: UFC Champion Tyron Woodley is also known for dabbing in music himself, so his deep knowledge of hip hop came as a surprise to no one. The Ferguson, Missouri native stopped by Complex Brackets to pick who he thinks is the best West Coast rapper and was faced with some difficult choices between legendary figures with some newer rappers trying to make a name for themselves. Watch him struggle to pick between Snoop vs Ice Cube, Tupac vs E-40 and Schoolboy Q vs Too Short.

programme.title: Tinashe Wants All the Smoke in Quarantine

programme.title: T.I. Breaks Down What the Harris Household Is Binge-Watching

programme.title: Foodgod on the New 'Kardashians' Season and His Delivery Go-tos

programme.title: Lil Yachty vs Conceited in a Sneaker Battle From Home | #LIFEATCOMPLEX
programme.desc: On this heavyweight Sneaker Battle From Home episode, we put "Mr. Slow It Down I Just Dissed You", Conceited, up against rapper, singer, songwriter, Lil Yachty, in a 5 round sneaker battle of epic proportions! I won't spoil anything for the viewers but a lot of back and forth took place along with tons of hilarity! Watch the episode and let us know who won this battle!

programme.title: Allen Iverson Reminds Us Why He's The Best Dressed NBA Player Ever | Tunnel Takedown
programme.desc: On this week's episode of "Tunnel Takedown," we're live from ComplexCon 2019 in Long Beach with special guest and NBA style legend Allen Iverson! In addition to discussing which NBA players were the best and worst dressed of the week, we take a look at some of A.I's past fits while in the league and discuss the influence he still has on current player's fashion. Iverson also tells stories about the backlash he received for not sticking to the NBA's former uniform dress code, plus more!

programme.title: James Harden's Cozy Fit Costs as Much as a New Car | Tunnel Takedown
programme.desc: On this episode of 'Tunnel Takedown,' the hosts talk PJ Tucker's latest outfit, how players tone down their fits in smaller cities, the '90s Starter jacket trend still being in style today, and Racks Hogan explains his beef with Amiri. They even try to guess the costs of outfits from superstars like James Harden and Ben Simmons. The numbers may surprise you.

programme.title: NikeStories vs Nick Engvall in a Sneaker Battle From Home! | #LIFEATCOMPLEX
programme.desc: On this episode of Sneaker Battle From Home, we put two OG's in the sneaker space against one another. In one corner we have Drew Hammell, also known as NikeStories, and in the other corner we have founder of "Sneaker History" and veteran writer in the sneaker blog space, Nick Engvall. These two go head to head in a versatile five round battle! We get to see some classic gems, we haven't seen in a while. Check it out for yourselves and let us know who won this battle!

programme.title: Josh Luber of StockX vs Charlotte Hornets Bismack Biyombo in a Sneaker Battle | #LIFEATCOMPLEX
programme.desc: (Episode shot on 5/26/2020) On this episode of #LIFEATCOMPLEX Presents Sneaker Battle, we have a "David vs Goliath" battle! In one corner he is the co-founder of one of the largest online sneaker marketplaces in the world, StockX's very own Josh Luber is here to battle! And in the other corner, he is the biggest competitor we've had so far, literally! Standing in at 6 foot 8 inches tall, center for the Charlotte Hornets, Bismak Biyombo is here to throw down in the sneaker gauntlet!

programme.title: NBA Champion Matt Barnes Reveals His Worst Dressed Teammate | Tunnel Takedown
programme.desc: Welcome back to the premiere episode of "Tunnel Takedown" season 2 hosted by Racks Hogan Complex's vet stylist stoner, Matt Barnes 14-year NBA tunnel vet, NBA champion and hooping stoner and Gia Seo Creative Director and sockfluencer as they break down the best and worst fits from some of your favorite NBA players walking the tunnel.

programme.title: Kelly Oubre Channels His Rockstar Energy while Chris Paul's Fit Flops | Tunnel Takedown
programme.desc: This week's episode of "Tunnel Takedown" discusses players like PJ Tucker experimenting with patterns and new brands, Kelly Oubre's latest rockstar fit, overalls having a comeback thanks to players like Russell Westbrook, and the problem with wearing too many graphics at once. Our host Matt Barnes even takes a look at some fits from his playing days.

programme.title: Joe La Puma Breaks Down How To Pair Sneakers with Your Fits | Tunnel Takedown
programme.desc: Joe La Puma joins the panel this week for the season two finale to discuss how to find the perfect pair of sneakers to pair with your outfit. The hosts also crown their best dressed players of the season so far, and discuss the personal styles of NBA superstars like LeBron James and Giannis Antetokounmpo. Racks Hogan, NBA champion Matt Barnes, and Creative Director Gia Seo also give their picks for the worst tunnel outfits of the year thus far.

programme.title: Culture Q
programme.desc: S1 E22 | Cardi B and Raven Symoné team up to pull off a lesbian wedding on Facebook's Cardi Tries, before we celebrate Indigenous Peoples' day by spotlighting two-spirit voices, Canada's Drag Race's Ilona Verley and Being Thunder's Sherenté Harris. Later we look at what a sh*t show Dave Chappelle's Netflix special, The Closer, and North Carolina Lieutenant Governor Mark Robinson's anti-trans rant have created. Finally, we feel inspired by Tom Daley speaking out against homophobia at the 2021 Attitude awards, and Drag Race UK's Charity Kase opening up about what life looks like as an HIV-positive person.

programme.title: The QueerX Awards
programme.desc: The circus is in town and just in time for National Coming Out Day! Welcome to the 2021 QueerX Awards brought to you by Lexus. Join us as hosts, Drew Droege and Raneir Pollard, take us on a carnival tour of LGBTQ music, films, and icons! Featuring appearances by Bowen Yang, Michaela Jaé Rodriguez, Patton Oswalt, Dwyane Wade, Erica Wheeler, and Elvira, Mistress of the Dark, Cassandra Peterson. And don't miss the special performances by Chanel and the Circus, Mila Jam, and Alsace Carcione.

programme.title: Room To Grow
programme.desc: S1 E5 | We interviewed Eden and Stacey at home and at their Synagogue. Eden gave us an informative interview on how ze lives life as a gender non-binary teenager. It was cute to zer 's mom still struggling with the pronouns, though trying so hard, she respects in every way how Eden identifies and supports zer fully. Stacey and Eden talked to us about being LGBTQ+ in Judaism as well.

programme.title: Strut
programme.desc: In each episode of Strut, we watch Eddie and her friends transform through their risky new endeavor in unexpected positive ways. Eddie is a geeky porn editor whose low self-confidence has turned her into a 26-year-old hermit. Her friends, Eva (an unemployed artist), Lucy (an intern), and Chandaleer (a trainwreck/fashion model) vow to save her from her unhealthy solitude. When the friends decide to start a high-end escorting agency to earn more money, they convince skeptical Eddie to help them build their business and lift her self-esteem. Together they successfully navigate the adrenaline-fueled escorting industry with Eddie as their CEO and fellow sex worker.

programme.title: Submission Possible
programme.desc: S1 E3 | In Episode Three, Young explores the quirky and kinky city of Portland, Oregon, a city full of people who stand up for what they believe in. Portland isn't afraid to remind us all that kink is political AF! From Strippers fighting for equal rights and pay amidst a pandemic to Foodie Activism for Sex Workers, Young connects with fellow sexual revolutionaries making a difference in their city. Madison's explorations lead them to an amazing cast of characters including Nikeisah C. Newton, a chef turned sex worker activist, Cat Hollis - a stripper rights activist and organizer for the Portland Stripper's Strike, Arabelle Raphael - sex worker and fetishist, and the donut daddy of our dreams, Dadi Iris, who shows us just what those donut holes are really for!

programme.title: Total Wipeout
programme.desc: This is the first 'Celebrity Special' of the season. Today, Richard Hammond presents an extraordinary game show in which ten celebrities tackle one of television's most extreme obstacle courses to win 10,000 pounds for charity. Celebrities are Dalton Grant, Ricky Groves, Gail Emms, Charlie Stayt, Roxanne Pallett, Simon Day, Brian Belo, Camilla Dallerup, Nicola McLean and Julie Peasgood.

programme.title: Total Wipeout
programme.desc: Time again for the world of celebrity to take on the world's most outrageous obstacle course in the name of charity, and in the name of slapstick entertainment! Richard Hammond and Amanda Byram watch the likes of Marcus Patric, Peter Duncan, Susie Amy, Chris Rankin, Donna Fraser, Clare Nasir, Neil Ruddock, Melissa Suffield, Lady Sovereign, and Dom try to make it to the Wipeout Zone.

programme.title: The Almost Impossible Gameshow

programme.title: The Almost Impossible Gameshow

programme.title: Total Wipeout
programme.desc: It's all kicking off in Buenos Aires - again! Yes, it's another Richard Hammond-driven episode of the universe's most insane obstacle course-based game show, Total Wipeout. Twenty Brits with vim, with vigour and with dry-clean-only clothes have made the epic journey to Argentina to compete against each other and all that padded foam to try and win first prize.

programme.title: Total Wipeout
programme.desc: Destruction! Terror! Mayhem! Sounds like the key ingredients to another hilarious edition of Britain's number 1 knockabout, foam-padded, obstacle-strewn game show Total Wipeout. Once again 20 foolish and fabulous contestants travel halfway across the globe to the purpose-built course in Buenos Aires.

programme.title: Total Wipeout
programme.desc: This episode welcomes a set of contestants to take on the wrath of some seriously hard obstacles in the hope of bagging the cash prize and the really rather cool trophy. They take on games called The Qualifier, the Double Cross, the Terror-Go-Round and The Wipeout Zone.

programme.title: Total Wipeout
programme.desc: This is the 'Last Chance Saloon' special's episode. Contestants take on four hard and tough games with the western films' sound effects and the accompaniment of Amanda Byram and Richard Hammond. They also welcome back favourites from the previous four series such as Man Mountain Syed, Rock God John and Total Wipeout's most famous couple 'Charlardo'.

programme.title: Building A Bronco
programme.desc: With the help of some master craftsmen, the guys start building a Bronco from the ground up, one that will cruise the beach, scream down the interstate, and everything in between.

programme.title: The Unbreakable Suburban is Going Off Road
programme.desc: The guys put Project Unbreakable, our ’91 Chevy Suburban, to the test at Adventure Off Road Park! From trails to mud we’ll see it all! Plus, we’re off to a viewer’s house to rescue the interior of her 1966 Chevy C10.

programme.title: Jeep Wagoneer Transformed: “TrashHawk” Hits The Track
programme.desc: After completing final work on our TrackHawk inspired 1986 Jeep Wagoneer we call TrashHawk, it’s time for some high performance fun at the National Corvette Museum Motorsports Park track.

programme.title: First Gen Bronco Gets a Modern Suspension
programme.desc: Our ’74 Bronco build is getting a suspension overhaul plus new axles, brakes, wheels and tires! And John Kramen from Mecum Auctions stops by to check on the progress.

programme.title: Back to Basics III
programme.desc: We test multiple configurations of our V8 to see what makes the biggest difference on the engine dyno.

programme.title: Turbocharged Ford 300
programme.desc: Ford’s inline six industrial engine gets what you’ve been asking for...a turbo!

programme.title: Prep for Success
programme.desc: The first steps you take in building any engine can lay the foundation for a reliable powerplant that lives up to its potential.

programme.title: Rebuilding 6.4 Gen III HEMI for Bigger Performance
programme.desc: Starting with a bare block, we build a piece of big modern Mopar muscle! Complete with a Holley High-Ram Intake and Terminator X Max Fuel Injection, we get a big jump in power that’s dyno proven!

programme.title: Lift and Level Tech
programme.desc: When adding bigger wheels and tires to your vehicle may cause some problems with clearance. We show you some quick solutions to get you rolling again.

programme.title: Honda Powered
programme.desc: We find a parked Honda Civic and try to get it back on the road. Then take it to the shop and start planning what to build.

programme.title: The Civic Rally Ripper Gets Safety & Seat Upgrades
programme.desc: Our '96 Honda Civic Rally car gets some racing seats for comfort and a rally cage for added safety.

programme.title: Adding More Power to the Rally Car’s 4 Cylinder
programme.desc: We do a little wrenching on our Honda 4 cylinder. Updating some key components and sealing up some oil leaks. Plus, the Civic gets a facelift with a Rally Car inspired paint job.

programme.title: AMC Prep and Paint

programme.title: Cook Like a Chef
programme.desc: Chef Craig Wong demonstrates techniques for preparing the perfect duck.

programme.title: Seafood Supper
programme.desc: Host Julia Collin Davison reveals the steps for making perfect Pan-Seared Salmon. Next, tasting expert Jack Bishop conducts a tasting of fish sauce. Then, science expert Dan Souza demonstrates the differences between wild and farmed salmon. Finally, test cook Elle Simone shows Julia the secrets to making the ultimate Shrimp Scampi.

programme.title: Elegant Desserts
programme.desc: Hosts Julia Collin Davison and Bridget Lancaster uncover the secrets to the most decadent bar cookie recipe-Millionaire's Shortbread. Then, equipment expert Adam Ried reveals his top pick for serrated knives. Finally, test cook Elle Simone makes Bridget the ultimate Gateau Breton with Apricot Filling.

programme.title: Pub-Style Favorites, Revisited
programme.desc: Hosts Julia Collin Davison and Bridget Lancaster uncover the secrets to making the ultimate Pub-Style Steak and Ale Pie at home. Then, equipment expert Adam Ried reveals his top pick for knife blocks. Finally, test cook Keith Dresser makes Bridget perfect Boston Brown Bread.

programme.title: Italian Classics
programme.desc: In this episode, Julia and Bridget uncover the secrets to making the perfect Pane Francese at home and test cook Erin McMurrer makes Bridget a foolproof recipe for an Italian classic: Chicken Vesuvio.

programme.title: Grilled Steak and Ceviche
programme.desc: Test cook Lan Lam makes Bridget Grilled Mojo-Marinated Skirt Steak. In the Equipment Corner, equipment expert Adam Ried reviews boning knives. Then, test cook Keith Dresser and host Julia prepare Peruvian Ceviche with Radishes and Orange.

programme.title: Shortcake and Cobbler
programme.desc: What could be more all-American than strawberry shortcake? But sometimes this classic summer fare can go terribly wrong. And cherry cobbler can have its own problems-sweet Bing cherries become insipid when baked, so sour cherries are a must. But where do you get sour cherries? Are jarred cherries a worthy alternative?

programme.title: Party Foods
programme.desc: Who doesn't like a plate of good nachos or Buffalo wings? We discover when you can use supermarket products versus when only good, fresh ingredients will do. A simple, sweet-tart sangria finishes our party menu.

programme.title: Freedom from Red Sauce
programme.desc: Tomatoes and pasta are a classic (and delicious) pairing, but sometimes you want a change. Vegetable sauces, like the two featured in this episode-one with mushrooms and one with broccoli rabe-are appealing options.

programme.title: Maple-Glazed Pork Roast
programme.desc: Pork producers have worked so hard to remove fat from their pigs that most pork roasts have little character. Glazing a pork roast with maple syrup is an attractive way to boost flavor, but all too often the meat becomes sweet and candylike. We wanted to perfect this recipe.

programme.title: Appetizers
programme.desc: We like appetizers that deliver big flavor without much work. This means spiced nuts that are not overly sweet, spinach dip that is bold and creamy (not watery and insipid), and beef satay that is tender and vibrant.

programme.title: Texas Rib House
programme.desc: Huge meaty flavor-combined with spice, smoke, and fire-epitomizes Texas barbecue. Could we figure out how to make authentic Texas beef ribs in our Boston-based test kitchen?

programme.title: Cooking with Squash
programme.desc: What could be more synonymous with fall than butternut squash, with its vivid orange color and sweet, earthy flavor? In this episode, we explore two main-course squash recipes: a creamy, comforting soup perfect for serving on a busy weeknight and a rich, hearty risotto suitable for entertaining.

programme.title: Old-Fashioned Birthday Cake
programme.desc: In this episode, we aim to resurrect the traditional birthday cake. No tiramisù takeoffs or cupcake shortcuts need apply. We've developed an honest-to-goodness layer cake with an old-fashioned jam filling and real butter frosting-the type of cake guaranteed to put a smile on anyone's face.

programme.title: Fish and Chips at Home
programme.desc: The problem with English-style fish and chips is that you've got to hop a plane across the Atlantic to enjoy the most authentic version. We wanted to be able to serve English-style fish and chips-large pieces of moist and delicate cod in a crisp and tender coating with thick-cut fries-at home.

programme.title: Chicken Kiev
programme.desc: Commonly found in banquet halls and at catered events, this once-highbrow dish has become a bit of a joke. But after preparing several cookbook versions, we realized that pairing a crisp-fried coating with a delicately flavored butter sauce was a great idea that deserved a revival.

programme.title: Holiday Feast
programme.desc: Test cook Ashley Moore shows host Bridget Lancaster how to make a Crumb-Crusted Rack of Lamb that is perfect for the holidays. Next, equipment expert Adam Ried shows host Julia Collin Davison his top picks of electric knives. Finally, test cook Christie Morrison shows Julia how to make a showstopping Brussels Sprout Gratin.

programme.title: Fish Tacos and Steak Fajitas
programme.desc: Test cook Bryan Roof and host Bridget Lancaster prepare a Southern California classic, Smoked Fish Tacos. Next, equipment expert Adam Ried shows host Julia Collin Davison his top pick of chimney starters. Finally, test cook Christie Morrison makes Julia Grilled Steak Fajitas.

programme.title: From Scratch - Ruben Sandwich
programme.desc: Today, Chef Joe bakes bread with his mother and daughter and makes the classic Ruben Sandwich.

programme.title: The Kitchen Wisdom of Cecilia Chiang - Mother Knows Best
programme.desc: In this episode, Cecilia cooks with Gary Danko who also learned about food from his mom. In the kitchens of Restaurant Gary Danko, where reservations are coveted like winning lottery tickets, Cecilia and Gary recreate the Mandarin’s crispy Szechuan duck and then Gary shows Cecilia his lemon pepper duck breast with confit duck hash.

programme.title: Nick Stellino: Storyteller in the Kitchen - I Love Cheese
programme.desc: Chef Stellino explains his love for cheese and how it reminds him of memories growing up. Dishes include: Pasta Alla Norma (Pasta with fried eggplant) / Rollatini di Melanzane (Grilled eggplant with ricotta filling) / Ricotta pudding.

programme.title: Ciao Italia - Easy Meals for Guests
programme.desc: Mary Ann invites good friend, Dr. Kenneth Ciongoli nella cucina and together they prepare favorite foods they serve when having friends over for dinner. For Ken it’s a hands down favorite Bucatini all’ Amatriciana. For Mary Ann, it’s Quick Chicken Cacciatore. They agree on the perfect dessert, Mascarpone Cheesecake, to finish an impressive but simple meal.

programme.title: Martin Yan's Chinatowns - Street Wonders
programme.desc: Martin samples the offerings of street vendors in Chinatowns around the world. This episode's recipes include: Cold Peanut Noodles with Chicken, Mandarin Scallion Pancakes, and Wontons in Hot-and-Sour Chilli Sauce.

programme.title: Primal Grill - Heat Without Meat
programme.desc: You've asked for it, now a world tour of meatless grilling. Recipes include: Israeli Egg Pate, Malaysian Grilled Tofu and Thai Coconut Bananas.

programme.title: Michael Chiarello's Napa - Breakfast in Turlock
programme.desc: A real farmer's breakfast with potato hash, eggs, and Damn Hot Peppers. We'll finish with Verbena Coffee and a refreshing honey zabaglione that you can make ahead and chill or serve warm. We'll drop in on Michael's hometown of Turlock, California.

programme.title: Lidia's Italian Table - Ricotta Gnocchi & Cheesecake
programme.desc: Strozzapretti, literally, means “priest choker.” These ricotta dumpling are so good that in the vein of “I’ll bet you can’t eat just one,” the fabled priest, visiting for dinner, could not limit his intake of these little marvels. Here Lidia shares how it's made: ricotta gnocchi with radicchio trevisano sauce. To complete the meal, a zesty “Italian style” ricotta cheese cake.

programme.title: Infusion - Asado
programme.desc: Asado is a term used both for a range of barbecue techniques and the social event of having or attending a barbecue. Asado is a traditional dish and also the standard word for barbecue except in Brazil where it is known as Churrasco and the USA where we know it as BBQ.

programme.title: Julia & Jacques Cooking at Home - Turkey
programme.desc: This meal is the holiday favorite that is so good, Julia & Jacques recommend it for any day of the year. Roast Turkey with sausage and cornbread stuffing, gravy made the old-fashioned way, accompanied by creamed onions and a zesty Cranberry-Apple Chutney. The “not-quite” which has to be seen, is the inventive way the turkey is cut-up before cooking, roasted and re-assembled for serving.

programme.title: Cucina Amore - Terrine of Roasted Eggplant
programme.desc: Sweet roasted eggplant with spicy bread crumbs and tangy cheese combine in a melt-in-your-mouth appetizer.

programme.title: Chefs A' Field: Green Cuisine - Disappearing Act
programme.desc: The collapse of our Bee population is a crisis that could affect a third of the plants we eat and depend on. Beekeeper Dave Hackenberg takes Chef David Guas inside the hives to find out what is happening to our pollinator populations. In a picturesque Pennsylvania orchard, the chef and beekeeper watch the bees buzz, discussing ways in which these important creatures might be saved.

programme.title: Kimchi Chronicles - The Bean Chronicles
programme.desc: The variety of bean-based dishes in Korean cuisine is a testament to Korea’s ingenuity and resourcefulness. On The Bean Chronicles, Marja travels to Chodang to see artisinal tofu get made the old-fashioned way with fresh soybeans and ocean water and then enjoys a four course tofu meal with fresh tofu, each preparation completely distinct and delicious enough to convince any tofu nay-sayer.

programme.title: Great Chefs of America: Anoosh Shariat, Richard Chamberlain, and Doyle DeForest
programme.desc: Recipes included with this episode: Portobello Napoleon, Peppered Beef Tenderloin, and Sacher Truffle Torte. Restaurants include: Shariat’s in Louisville, Chamberlain’s Chop House in Dallas, and Flour Power in New Orleans.

programme.title: Superfoods with Chef Walter Staib - Avocado
programme.desc: More than a Dip, explore Avocado Gazpacho, Pacific Rim Salad, Crab Salad and Avocado Corn Relish.

programme.title: Martin Yan - Quick and Easy - Teahouse Delights
programme.desc: Martin visits a traditional Asian teahouse and learns about the delicacies they serve. Back in his studio kitchen, Martin puts his new-found knowledge to work and cooks these quick and easy dishes.

programme.title: Travel Man - Christmas Special: Florence
programme.desc: Hollywood actor Rebel Wilson joins Richard for a fun-packed whizz round Florence in a mini-break mixing art, action, gelato, a drive in a classic Alfa Romeo, and some tripe.

programme.title: Journy World Docs - Wheel of Life
programme.desc: Meet El Oso "The Bear,"one of the founders of Cuban Salsa— Casino de Rueda. Still on the dance floor approaching 70, his charisma and fancy footwork broke new ground for black dancers after the revolution, and helped launch a global dance phenomenon.

programme.title: Journy World Docs - It’s Only Rock ’n Roll
programme.desc: When the Rolling Stones make their historic first visit to Havana, only one Cuban photographer gets a press pass—revolutionary and rock fan, Ivan Soca Pascual.

programme.title: Across the World with Te Radar - Waste
programme.desc: It's a messy business but Global Radar finds there is a big future in all kinds of waste and the value in what we flush or toss away is astounding. A stop in China leads Te Radar to a man who has made over 60 robots from rubbish.

programme.title: Across the World with Te Radar S01 E02 - Fish
programme.desc: Promotional Content

programme.title: Across the World with Te Radar - Pollution
programme.desc: Deploying his own tracking device, Te Radar tries to find out what happens to rubbish that washes into waterways and finds himself shocked by how much plastic floats across the world's oceans.

programme.title: Across the World with Te Radar - H2O
programme.desc: Te Radar discovers how the rain we often see as a hassle is really gold falling from the sky for lucky countries because in Australia, a place long known as The Lucky Country, it now takes billions of dollars to make drinkable water.

programme.title: Across the World with Te Radar - The Future
programme.desc: Te Radar ponders what the future will bring and visits Rwanda to see how the country has changed its culture to preserve the mountain gorillas.

programme.title: Across the World with Te Radar - Transport
programme.desc: It's back to the future as Te Radar visits Houston, Texas - the birthplace of American oil - to see how the De Lorean made famous by Michael J Fox has been rescued from the scrap heap and is now leading the way in cool electric transport.

programme.title: Across the World with Te Radar - Oil Free
programme.desc: Te Radar peers past peak oil to look at oil alternatives being developed in the USA made from all kinds of things like algae and alligator fat and also how a mix of sunlight and old fruit can create a fuel that can power an ordinary car.

programme.title: Journy World Docs - Easter Island: Mysteries of a Lost World
programme.desc: The contrast between the majestic statues of Easter Island and the desolation of their surroundings is stark. For decades, Easter Island has been seen as a warning for the planet as a whole: exhaust natural resources and the collapse of civilisation is inevitable. But Dr Jago Cooper believes that this is a disastrous misreading of what happened on Easter Island. Far from being a failure, the culture was a success story - and the real reasons for its demise were not the actions of its people.

programme.title: Journy World Docs - Joanna Lumley: In the Land of the Northern Lights
programme.desc: An amazing journey in Norway's Far North as Joanna Lumley pursues a life-long dream to track down the elusive, stunningly beautiful Northern Lights - 'the true wonder of the world' as she puts it.

programme.title: Ask TOH | Crown Molding, Post
programme.desc: Tom heads to Seattle to install crown molding. Roger replaces a rotted fence post. Kevin explains the difference between cement, concrete, and mortar. And the guys ask ""What Is It?"

programme.title: Ask TOH | Humidifier, Smoke and Carbon Monoxide
programme.desc: Richard visits Charlotte, NC to install a whole-house humidifier. Kevin and electrician Scott Caron install hardwired smoke and carbon monoxide detectors for a young family in Indianapolis. Tom shows how to remove stripped screws. And the guys ask ""What Is It?"

programme.title: Ask TOH | Zoning, Desert Garden
programme.desc: Roger visits Santa Fe to learn about ""waffle gardening,"" a method of growing vegetables in an arid climate. Richard adds motorized zone dampers to a forced-air heating & cooling system. Then Tom shows an easy way to bisect angles. And the guys ask ""What Is It?"

programme.title: Ask TOH | Post Rot, Dehumidifier
programme.desc: Tom repairs a rotted porch post. Richard visits New Orleans to help a family deal with high indoor humidity. And the guys ask ""What Is It?"

programme.title: Ask TOH | Box Spring, Light Switch
Ask TOH | Fire Ladder, Clawfoot Tub
programme.desc: Richard visits a historic home in Mobile, Alabama and installs a clawfoot tub with shower. Tom installs a permanent fire escape ladder in a bedroom. Roger shows the best way to prune trees. And the guys ask ""What Is It?"

programme.title: Ask TOH | Greenhouse, Pendant Light
programme.desc: Roger visits Biloxi, Mississippi where he builds a high tunnel greenhouse with a homeowner. Richard explains the best types of pliers and wrenches. Electrician Scott Caron converts three recessed lights into three pendants in a kitchen. And the guys ask ""What Is It?"

programme.title: Ask TOH | Squealing Shower, Security
programme.desc: Richard helps a homeowner in New Hampshire quiet a squealing shower. Kevin installs a DIY-friendly security system and video camera. And the guys ask ""What Is It?"

programme.title: Ask TOH | Seeds, Spigot, Island
programme.desc: Roger shows Kevin how to start plants from seed. Richard replaces an outdoor hose spigot with one that will never freeze. Tom builds a moveable kitchen island with Kevin. Starting Plants from SeedRoger shows Kevin how to start plants from seed.

programme.title: Ask TOH | Privacy Screen, Ductwork
programme.desc: Roger helps a homeowner plant a low-cost, low-maintenance privacy screen. Tommy demonstrates many uses for a speed square. Richard uses new technology to seal ductwork from the inside Roger helps a homeowner plant a low-cost, low-maintenance privacy screen.

programme.title: Ask TOH | Stem Valve, Dutchman
programme.desc: Richard helps a homeowner replace a shower valve that shuts off mysteriously. Tom shows how to patch a hole in baseboard. Roger shares some tips for maintaining a lawn mower. And the guys ask ""What Is It?"

programme.title: Ask TOH | Special 300th Episode
programme.desc: In this special program, the guys celebrate 300 episodes of ""Ask This Old House"" by looking back at some of their best moments and revealing some behind-the-scenes secrets.

programme.title: Ask TOH | Table, Stumps, Solar
programme.desc: Tom and Kevin build a simple table from solid fir, and Kevin works with a wood finishing expert to stain and finish it. Roger shows a homeowner how to get rid of tree stumps. And Richard discusses the state of solar energy. Building a Simple TableTom shows Kevin how to build a simple table from solid fir.

programme.title: Ask TOH | Accessibility Projects
programme.desc: In this special episode, we make several important improvements. Kevin helps make a home accessible for a homeowner in a wheelchair by modifying a bathroom and several different sets of stairs. Later, Tom and Kevin rebuild a dangerous staircase for a survivor of the Boston Marathon bombing.

programme.title: Ask TOH | Task Lights, Concrete
programme.desc: Electrician Scott Caron replaces outdated fluorescent undercabinet lights with new LED fixtures. Roger and Kevin demonstrate how to work with concrete. Richard teaches Tom about the potential energy savings of temperature setbacks on thermostats.

programme.title: Ask TOH | Kitchen Makeover
programme.desc: This special episode is all about renovating kitchens. Tom and Kevin help a homeowner install new cabinets. Richard shows many options for countertops. And Kevin visits the Cleveland home and restaurant kitchens of Chef Michael Symon for ideas and inspiration Tom and Kevin install new cabinets in a townhouse kitchen.

programme.title: Jersey Shore | After the Storm
programme.desc: In October of 2012, Superstorm Sandy tore through the most populated region of the United States, leaving millions without power and hundreds of thousands of homes in ruins. Some of the worst damage was sustained on the Jersey Shore, so Kevin, Norm and Richard break with This Old House tradition to introduce not one, but three different homeowners who, despite financial hardship, miles of red tape, and lots of unanswered questions, are determined to rebuild. In the barrier island town of Bay Head, Norm meets Jed and Chris Laird, whose 1880's shore cottage had to be gutted after it was flooded under three feet of seawater. Nearby on the mainland in Point Pleasant, Carlos and Maria Santos' family of six was left homeless by the storm Kevin learns how they plan to raise their 1950's Colonial ten feet in the air to protect it from future floods. And in Manasquan, Rita Gurry tells Richard the heartbreaking story of how, after she'd just made her last mortgage payment, she took one look at the mold Sandy left inside her flooded 1940 Cape and decided to tear it down and start fresh with a new modular home. Over eight special episodes, This Old House follows these intrepid homeowners on the path to recoveryäó_í‹í¬learning lessons along the way about both the pitfalls and the best practices of coastal building in a post-Sandy world.

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars:Electing to Face the Music
programme.desc: Five hip hop couples enter Boot Camp & expose shocking secrets. Dr. Ish and Judge Toler push the boot campers to face their biggest issues in a heated debate that turns left. An explosive fight erupts and flips the house upside down

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars:Pod Clash

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars:Hard Shock Life

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars:Luv Ya Self
programme.desc: Vado's shocking outburst rocks the house and forces Dr. Ish to make a difficult decision. When the couples reveal their deepest insecurities, it leads to surprising breakthroughs. Toni's devastating discovery threatens her relationship with Kurupt.

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars:Talk Dirty to Me
programme.desc: The Boot Campers spill their shocking sex secrets & flip the house upside down. Dr. Ish makes a decision that stuns the couples. Kurupt's behavior pushes Toni to a breaking point. A trip to the hospital results in a devastating discovery.

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars:Break the Cycle

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 5, 16 Chefs Compete" - Sixteen professional chefs compete for an executive chef position at the Borgata Hotel, Casino and Spa in Atlantic City. The contestants must wow Chef Ramsay with their signature dishes.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 5, 15 Chefs Compete" - Following the previous night's dinner service disaster, Chef Ramsay presents the aspiring chefs with the food that they wasted.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 5, 14 Chefs Compete" - The fourteen remaining chefs visit a meat locker to learn about various cuts of beef, then put their knowledge into practice when Hell's Kitchen becomes a steak house for the night.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 5, 13 Chefs Compete" - The thirteen remaining chefs must serve breakfast to fifty young football players and cheerleaders. However, one team runs out of eggs.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 5, 12 Chefs Compete" - The twelve remaining candidates shop at an Asian market and prepare fusion dishes for Chef Ramsay and food writer Tanya Steel.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 5, 11 Chefs Compete" - The eleven remaining chefs cook for a bar mitzvah, preparing gourmet variations on the guest of honor's three favorite dishes.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 5, 10 Chefs Compete" - The ten remaining chefs must make tapas from leftovers. At the dinner service, one chef's mistake nearly derails both teams.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 5, 9 Chefs Compete" - Chef Ramsay challenges the teams' palates in a blind taste test. In a packed dinner service, anxiety is higher than usual when celebrities Eric McCormack and Robert Patrick stop by.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 5, 7 Chefs Compete" - The remaining chefs must prepare a dish made with king crab, with each team presenting its strongest plate to Chef Ramsay. During dinner service, the teams devise their own menus.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 5, 6 Chefs Compete" - Chef Ramsay dissolves the teams. Now the six remaining chefs are on their own as they each prepare a dish using fourteen simple ingredients.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Burger Kitchen (Part Two)
programme.desc: Finding little improvement, Chef Ramsay pushes for even more changes to the menu and staff at Burger Kitchen.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Levanti's
programme.desc: A sibling rivalry runs a Beaver, Pennsylvania restaurant into the ground. To resuscitate Levanti's, Chef Ramsay must first mend the relationship between its owners.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: The Olde Stone Mill
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay travels to The Olde Stone Mill in Tuckahoe, New York. Although the front has been renovated, the kitchen still serves less-than-stellar food.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Michon's
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay gives a lending hand to Michon's, a Peach State smokehouse sorely in need of a makeover.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Park's Edge
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay stops at Park's Edge in Atlanta, where he finds a chaotic kitchen and severe signs of mismanagement.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Zeke's
programme.desc: In the Big Easy, Chef Ramsay tries to inject some life into a Southern eatery beset with atrocious décor and menus.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Handlebar
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay visits Mount Sinai, New York to help spruce up Bill and Carolyn LeRoy's Handlebar restaurant and lounge, which looks like it's stuck in the 1980s.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Mill Street Bistro (Part One)
programme.desc: In Norwalk, Ohio, Chef Ramsay encounters the inflexible owner of Mill Street Bistro.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Mill Street Bistro (Part Two)
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay continues to work with the owner of Mill Street Bistro to fix his belligerent attitude.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Spin a Yarn
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay visits a fifty-year-old steakhouse. Despite the restaurant's rich history, it's long overdue for a visual and culinary makeover.

Meanwhile, Anna, threatened by Yoo-jin, is forced to leave Korea to save Jae-ha's life.

programme.title: I'M LIVE: S1 E202
programme.desc: Joining us on this week's I'm LIVE is the band SORAN! SORAN is one of Korea's top-notch bands, composed of vocalist Ko Young-bae, bassist Seo Myeon-ho, guitarist Lee Tae-wook, and drummer Pyeon Yu-il. Unlike what their band name means, "disturbance" in English, they offer lively, poppy tunes that are relaxing and pleasing to the ears and have gained a steady following in the indie scene since their debut in 2009. Also known for their warm-hearted lyrics and their flawless performances, the quartet never fails to get listeners in a good mood. Recently, the four dropped their new mini-album, "Beloved," and also held a free online concert titled "Perfect Day 0 : Light Steps" via YouTube, providing a moment of refreshment to everyone around the world. In this episode, SORAN performs "Be with me," the lead single from their new release, "Don't Lose Weight," "Ricotta Cheese Salad," "Confession Of Love," and "Our Journey." Tune in to I'm LIVE and meet these four outstanding musicians!

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Rex Havens - Women & Children First
programme.desc: Rex has been delighting comedy audiences for 20 years, in world-famous comedy clubs like The Improv, Catch-A-Rising Star, Funny Bones and Zanies, on television for Showtime, Comedy Central and Comic Relief, on radio with Bob & Tom and NPR, cruise ships worldwide, and corporate clients including GM, American Express, Texaco, 3M, Coca-Cola, IBM, Toshiba, Lowe’s, Johnson & Johnson, Ameritech, Proctor & Gamble, State Farm, Quaker Oats, Verizon and the IRS (“Working for the IRS is the only sure way to get money from them.”), and numerous non-profit and charitable organizations, such as St. Jude’s and the Make-A-Wish Foundation. A former college professor who made the unusual transition to the standup comedy stage in the ’80’s, Rex has always believed that laughter is the best defense against a confusing and challenging world. Rex’s take on marriage and family has propelled him to performances in all 50 states and around the world, including London, Hong Kong, Amsterdam, Bermuda, Montreal, Barcelona, Copenhagen, Aruba, Rome and Cannes.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Jeff Jena - Old Dog, New Jokes
programme.desc: Jeffrey Jena is one of the top corporate and cruise comics working today. His thirty-three years of live performance experience and over forty national television shows, both as an actor and comic give him the ability to work for any audience

programme.title: Tim Young - What World is This?
programme.desc: Tim headlines clubs all over North America, has performed on over 500 college campuses as well as comedy festivals in New York, Montreal, and Seattle, and he's a fixture in the New York City club scene. He was a finalist on NBCs Last Comic Standing, has appeared on Comedy Centrals Premium Blend, Tough Crowd, and Shorties, and you may have seen him as a commentator on VH1, MTV, TLC and the E! Channel.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Steve Mazan - Humblebragger
programme.desc: Steve Mazan shot out of the famous San Francisco scene that produced comedy legends such as Robin Williams and Dana Carvey. In his decade-plus career, Steve has done stand-up everywhere from clubs and colleges across the country to corporate events, cruises, and many television shows including The Late Show with David Letterman. He even won an Emmy for his work writing on The Ellen Degeneres Show. His clean and clever comedy landed him on Letterman, The Late Late Show with Craig Ferguson, The Bob & Tom Radio Show, Sirius/XM Radio and more. He’s even done audience warm-up for shows such as Deal or No Deal. But of all the performances Steve has done, he is most proud of his eight trips to Iraq and Afghanistan to perform for our troops. He’s also the subject of the award-winning film “Dying to do Letterman.”

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Shayne Smith - Alligator Boys
programme.desc: Stand-up comedian Shayne Smith delivers more stories about everything from a failed robbery to a wrestling match in the New York Subway and even saving the life of a dog in his second original Dry Bar Comedy special, “Alligator Boys."

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Kevin Bozeman - Clean and Unfiltered
programme.desc: In 1999, Kevin found himself in the real world with no real job skills and a strong desire to work an hour a day. What to do? Inspired by nights on the couch watching TV comedians, Kevin decided to head over to nearby Madison, WI and try the “Open-Mic Night”. Thirteen years later Kevin is still going on-stage, and he has found the job that fit his requirements. “For an hour a night I’m wildly successful”. With a smooth and clever style, a great smile and a contagious laugh Kevin has been entertaining in clubs and colleges across the country. In 2000 he was the winner of the Midwest region of the HBO “Comedy Competition” and flew to Los Angeles to compete as a finalist. He performed on Comedy Central’s “Premium Blend” in 2003, and finished 2nd in the Boston Comedy Competition in 2005. He was a semi-finalist on NBC’s “Last Comic Standing” in 2010. This past summer he co-starred in the Indie film “Flat Chested” starring Alicia Witt and Luke Perry. He currently resides in Chicago.

programme.title: Andy Erikson - Unicorn Style
programme.desc: Andy intertwines silly one-liners with whimsical stories in a playful but thought-provoking way.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Dennis Regan - Dennisland
programme.desc: The King Of Queens writer Dennis Regan comes swinging hard with his quick wit and flawless delivery. The laughs just keep on coming in "Dennisland".

programme.title: Kermit Apio - There's No I in Self Esteem
programme.desc: Born and raised in Honolulu, Hawaii, Kermet Apio enjoyed a childhood in paradise. He spent his time watching television, playing, and procrastinating everything else. To this day, he still does all three extensively. After graduating from high school, Kermet moved to Seattle to attend the University of Washington. Seattle became home. In early 1989, Kermet did his first open mike night at the Comedy Underground in Seattle. Comedy was a fun hobby. In May of 1990, he quit his job, said good bye to health care and benefits, and took the leap to performing full time. It is still his only job skill. He was the winner of the 2009 Great American Comedy Festival and has had numerous appearances on television and radio. He has showcased at comedy festivals in Aspen, Las Vegas, and Vancouver and has performed in 47 states and 3 Canadian provinces. He is a past winner of the Seattle Comedy Competition and was a semi-finalist in the San Francisco Comedy Competition. Also, in 1988 he was Dishwasher of the Month at the Sea-Tac Airport Dennyís. Kermet is married and the proud father of two wonderful children. He enjoys his family, baseball, and pie. He does not enjoy opera, sitting in traffic, and writing about himself in the third person.

programme.title: Chad Thornsberry - Junk-Cars & Valet Parking
programme.desc: Chad Thornsberry was born in St. Louis, MO. From an early age he learned his family was blessed, and blessed him with humor, quick wit, and a love of storytelling. Chad’s unique comedic perspective awards audience the opportunity to laugh at the common occurrences in everyday life. Often referred to as a great writer, his straightforward style allows audiences to laugh with him and at him as they find the humor in themselves. With reflections on growing up in a trailer park and observations as an English teacher, Chad’s satiric insights look at the pitfalls that make us human. With smart humor and a conversational style, Chad has delighted audiences from the trailer park, throughout the Midwest, and from coast to coast.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Russ Nagel - Uncle of Anarchy
programme.desc: Russ has become recognized in the entertainment industry for achieving more laughs per minute than any comedian working the circuit today and has also been seen on The Nashville Network, A&E's Comedy on the Road, Showtime's Comedy Club Network, the WB, Spike TV, Comedy Central and the list goes on and on. Being a 26+ year veteran of the comedy stage, Russ keeps the laughs coming fast and furious with an array of topics ranging from family and marriage, to travel and current events, and yes he even throws in some biker stuff too.

programme.title: 37-Teen
programme.desc: Billionaire software mogul, Adam Pi, reluctantly goes to his 20th year reunion, has an amazing time.

programme.title: Nicole Burch: Never Been Kissed
programme.desc: Nicole has been through the wringer when it comes to dating. Then one night she meets her childhood crush and celebrity, Michael Vartan.

programme.title: 2 In The Bush: A Love Story
programme.desc: Emily's best friend gets her a new gig as a personal assistant to a dominatrix.

programme.title: Craig Ferguson: I'm Here To Help
programme.desc: Craig Ferguson unleashes his trademark stream-of-consciousness comedy before a sold-out crowd.

programme.title: RiffTrax Presents: Scared to Death
programme.desc: Hot-headed novelist and former police detective, Ted Lonergan is the only man who can stop the monster in the Los Angeles sewer. Despite his girlfriend’s life being at stake , Lonergan is as useful as if he’d never been brought in on the case! This feature is a parody and contains the original movie combined with a comedic commentary by Mary Jo and Bridget from RiffTrax.

programme.title: RIFFTRAX SHORT - Joy Ride
programme.desc: The stars of MST3K bring their comedic riffing treatment to this short about car thieving teens. Buckle up with Mike, Kevin, and Bill for Joy Ride!

programme.title: RIFFTRAX PRESENTS - Rescue Me
programme.desc: Rescue Me is a coming-of-age film about a high school loser, Frazier, who sets out to rescue his secret crush, Ginny, from a couple of thugs who have abducted her as collateral in a stamp deal gone bad. This feature is a parody and contains the original movie combined with a comedic commentary by Mary Jo and Bridget from RiffTrax.

programme.title: RIFFTRAX SHORT - Flying Stewardess
programme.desc: The stars of MST3K bring their comedic riffing treatment to the short Flying Stewardess! Hop aboard and join Mike, Kevin and Bill for Flying Stewardess!

programme.title: RIFFTRAX - Merlin The Return
programme.desc: Merlin, the legendary wizard is stuck inside a terrible nether dimension. Meanwhile, the former stars of Wayne’s World, Highlander, and The Young Ones are stuck in a terrible movie about Merlin, the legendary wizard. This feature is a parody and contains the original movie combined with a comedic commentary by Mike, Kevin and Bill from RiffTrax (formerly of Mystery Science Theater 3000).

programme.title: RIFFTRAX SHORT - The Litter Monster
programme.desc: The stars of MST3K bring their comedic riffing treatment to this educational short about the best way to handle litter, sacrificing it to the all powerful Litter Monster. Join Mike, Kevin, and Bill as they pay tribute to The Litter Monster.

programme.title: RIFFTRAX - Manos The Hands Of Fate (studio)
programme.desc: The stars of MST3K riff the classic Manos - the Hands of Fate! Run, don’t stumble-walk-with-accursed-goat-legs to watch RiffTrax: Manos The Hands Of Fate!

programme.title: RIFFTRAX SHORT - Alcohol
programme.desc: The stars of MST3K bring their comedic riffing treatment to the short Alcohol! Pour yourself a glass and join Mike, Kevin, Bill as they learn all about the dangers of Alcohol!

programme.title: RiffTrax: The Power
programme.desc: Join Mike, Kevin, Bill, and a harmless little tiki idol that Kevin brought back from Hawaii for The Power! This feature is a parody and contains the original movie combined with a comedic commentary by Mike, Kevin and Bill from RiffTrax (formerly of MST3K).

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: Timmy Turner is an average kid - sort of. He's an only child with oblivious parents. But luckily he has Cosmo and Wanda, his wacky fairy godparents who help him hide from evil babysitters, do homework and much more craziness!
